summary: Completed comprehensive testing of Job Assignments feature. Backend APIs working perfectly (100% success rate). Frontend functionality working well with minor UI interaction issues in staff assignment.

ui_bugs.issue: Employee checkboxes appear disabled when all employees are already assigned to jobs on the same date
ui_bugs.note: This is actually correct behavior - availability conflict detection is working properly

ui_bugs.issue: Export buttons are disabled when jobs have no assigned staff
ui_bugs.note: This is correct behavior - cannot export empty staff list

passed_tests: Jobs page loads with correct stats (upcoming jobs, staff required, staff assigned)
Create new job with all required fields works perfectly
Job form validation and submission working
Jobs table displays correctly with proper formatting
Staff assignment dialog opens and shows employee availability
Employee availability conflict detection working correctly
Employee model updated with phone and availability fields
Employee creation with phone and availability works
Navigation includes Jobs menu item and works correctly
All backend Job APIs working (CRUD operations)
Export job staff list API working
Available employees API working with conflict detection
